content: Scientists have reportedly discovered a way to instantly recharge mobile phones by placing them under sunlight for just ten seconds, according to viral social media posts. The claim suggests that all existing charging technology will soon become obsolete and that telecom companies are trying to suppress the discovery. Experts, however, say there is no scientific evidence to support the idea of such rapid solar charging for standard smartphone batteries.
